title: STAT+: FDA Commissioner Marty Makary tries to soothe staff concerns over voucher program
description: At an employee town hall, FDA leaders tried to quell staff concerns about a controversial new program to fast-track certain drugs.
content: At an employee town hall, FDA leaders tried to quell staff concerns about a controversial new program to fast-track certain drugs.
